SELECT rt.`id`, rt.`record_status` as recordState, zmi.`machine_id`, zmi.machine_no, zmi.machine_num, zmi.battery, zmi.`box_battery`, zti.temperature FROM record_temperature rt LEFT JOIN zs_machine_info zmi ON rt.`machine_id` = zmi.`machine_id` LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM zs_temperature_info WHERE machine_id = #{machineId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, create_time, CONCAT(CURDATE(),' ',CURTIME()))< 3 ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT 1) zti on zti.machine_id = rt.`machine_id`
and rt.`id` = #{recordId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT pi.`name` AS patientName, pi.`case_num` AS caseNum, hd.`name` AS departmentName, hr.`name` AS room, hb.`name` AS bed, rt.history FROM record_temperature rt left join record_base rb on rt.base_id = rb.id LEFT JOIN patient_info pi ON rb.`patient_id` = pi.`patient_id` LEFT JOIN hospital_bed hb ON hb.`bed_id` = rb.`bed_id` LEFT JOIN hospital_room hr ON hr.`room_id` = hb.`room_id` LEFT JOIN `hospital_department` hd ON hr.`department_id` = hd.`department_id` WHERE rt.status = 0 and rb.status = 0 AND rt.`start_time`<= concat(#{date, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,' 24:00:00') AND (rt.`end_time` is not NULL OR rt.`end_time` >= concat(#{date, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,' 00:00:00'))
and hd.department_id = #{departmentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
